# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat segment contains minimal technical discussion. The only technical issue raised was about clipping problems when adding a GLB scene, with suggestions to either use the Model app's collision button or to create custom colliders. The conversation also briefly touched on ideas for web3-related features like a "walk of fame" for projects and a "walk of shame" for failed projects. Overall, this was a very brief and limited technical exchange with one specific implementation suggestion for handling model collisions.
